page.title: 09Holiday Shows
page.content: When people are on holiday they like to see a live show. Scarborough has several to offer. At the Spa{Max Jaffa is in his 26th. year of classical violin concerts. The Spa also stages morning concerts and a small family show called{Dazzle.}You can also watch {All in Wrestling}at the Spa. This year {Ken Dodd and the Diddymen}are booked for a summer season at the Futurist Theatre but in the meantime the pop group{Shawaddywaddy}are performing a series of concerts. The Royal Opera House has a{T.V. Laughter Show {starring David Copperfield, Roger De {Courcey, Bobby Knut and Nookie the {Bear.}The Opera House also have a series of local Talent Competitions. When the Shows take a rest on Sunday there are one night guest appearances from stars. Show stars are much in demand to open local fetes and fairs.
